title: Teardown reveals how much capacity Appleâ€™s $99 MagSafe Battery Pack has
content:
• The inside of the MagSafe Battery Pack.

This week, Apple launched the MagSafe Battery Pack for the iPhone 12, iPhone 12 mini, iPhone 12 Pro, and iPhone 12 Pro Max. But until the product found its way into peoples' hands, there were some unknowns.

Some of those have now been clarified in a new teardown video by Charger Lab.

While there had been clues suggesting that the MagSafe Battery Pack measured in at just over 11 watt-hours, we weren't 100% sure. Now we have confirmation. The battery pack has two identical batteries inside it, and each of the two batteries is labeled 5.733Wh. In total, the MagSafe Battery Pack has a capacity of 1460mAh.

Read 4 remaining paragraphs | Comments
author: Samuel Axon
